title: Ornot Deep Winter Drop: New Magic Shell Jacket, Grid Merino Jersey & Decadent Cap
content:
This weekend it’s once again time to pin our hopes of warmer weather on a rodent observing its own shadow. Regardless of what Phil says, many of us still have plenty of snow on the ground and cold temperatures in the forecast. Ornot is here with some new apparel to make the cold days good days on the bike.

Magic Shell Jacket

Polartec Power Shield fabric used on the Magic Shell is breathable enough for use as an everyday cycling jacket, while bonded and taped seams allow it to be called 99% wind and water proof. New rear pockets and two-layer cuffs could make it the only outer layer needed to enjoy year-round riding, regardless of the weather. Actually made in California, the soft and stretchy fabric allows easy layering from 55 to 32 degrees and has a two-way YKK zipper for temperature regulation on the bike.

FEATURES

  • Extremely breathable microporous hydrophobic membrane.
  • Perfect from 55 degrees to below freezing with appropriate layers.
  • Bonded and taped seams
  • 99% windproof and waterproof
  • Updated 2-layer Cuff
  • Stretchy and Quiet – Doesn’t flap in the wind
  • Constructed with bluesign®-approved materials, which conserve resources and protect the environment’s health, workers, and you.
  • YKK 2-way double zipper.
  • 255 grams (size small).
  • Size-specific rear pockets, secure zipper pocket
  • Low-key reflective detailing on front and back.
  • PFAS Free DWR coating + bluesign®-approved fabric.
  • Made in California!
  • MSRP: $285

Merino Grid Jersey

Ornot’s Merino Grid is made in the USA from deadstock Polartec Power Wool, with everything you love about extra-fine merino wool (antimicrobial, wicking, and keeping you warm even when wet). The grid structure helps trap air pockets to keep you warm under a layer, but it quickly breathes and dumps heat when worn alone. Bonus: Merino Wool is capable of wicking moisture in the vapor state, keeping you more comfortable and less sweaty.

FEATURES

  • Merino wool interior – Naturally wicking, thermoregulating, and odor-resistant.
  • Durable abrasion-resistant face.
  • Constructed with bluesign®-approved materials that conserve resources and protect the environment’s health, workers, and you.
  • Temp range from 45-60 degrees and is perfect for layering.
  • 2-way YKK zipper.
  • 3 rear pockets, secure zipper pocket, reflective details.
  • Shape retention and 4-way stretch for all-day comfort.
  • 54% recycled poly, 38% wool, 8% spandex (merino wool is placed on the inside)
  • Sewn by hand in the USA.
  • MSRP: $176.00

Decadent Cap

Made from domestically sourced Polartec Power Wool, this USA-made Merino Wool Blend fabric claims to be the softest fabric Ornot has ever used. Calling it thin enough to fit under a helmet, a shortened brim is included for improved vision while maintaining its ability to block sun, rain, sleet, hail, etc. Bonus ear flaps for added warmth. Made in the SF Bay Area with US-milled fabric weighing a scant 44 grams, this cap easily packs into your back pocket or handlebar Bag.

FEATURES

  • Designed and sewn in California.
  • Made from Deadstock Fabric Milled in the USA
  • Naturally odor resistant
  • Flatlock stitching
  • Small brim to keep the rain out of your eyes.
  • Fold-down / Flip-up ear flaps.
  • Temp range 30-50
  • One size fits most heads. 21.5″-24.5″
  • Constructed with bluesign®-approved materials that conserve resources and protect the environment’s health, workers, and you.
  • 44 grams
  • MSRP: $54.00
